You know, whenever things get difficult doing the Web 2.0 thing within a traditional publisher (and I’ve just seen some more journalistic backlash – always fun), I come across something like this (sighted on [Adriana’s revamped and rehoused blog](http://www.mediainfluencer.net/2007/08/force-blogging/)) to make me glad things aren’t ever that bad:
